content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello, Maria. It's a pleasure to meet you. Let's indeed discuss the rental price of the apartment. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your time, Mister Heine. I've seen similar apartments in the area, and I'm willing to pay around 1,200 Euro per month. Is that within your range?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Maria, 1,200 Euro per month is a very reasonable offer, considering the size and location of the apartment. However, I must confess that I was hoping for a slightly higher rent. Would you be willing to negotiate a bit?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Mister Heine, I understand your position. I'm open to negotiation. How much higher were you hoping for?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Maria, I was initially looking for a rent closer to 1,500 Euro per month. This would reflect the premium value of the apartment in this prime location. Would you be able to meet somewhere in the middle, perhaps around 1,350 Euro?
name: Heinrich Heine
